value:
$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The light of my compass is growing
brighter. We should catch Ótr soon.
He should be just up ahead...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Up ahead? Doesn't that mean
he's gone into the sage's forest?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Does that mean...Eitri and Ótr are
working together?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's entirely possible. Princess Nótt
was working with him, so it is within
the realm of reason.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hey, Sis. Heard anything about
any of this sage stuff?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|I've heard nothing of the sort.
Ótr asked me to deliver the sword
and the summoner. That's all.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Pain|*sigh* I still don't get why you went
along with that guy. What was going
through your head?!$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|His face! I told you—he's my type!
That's all there is to it!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Let's hurry and get to the sanctum.
If we're quick, we may be able to
save $Nu too!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ファリナ,ch03_30_Farina_F_Normal,Face|Fiora, Florina... I'll be back one day...
and I'll be hauling lots of gold.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Ah, hello. We meet again, Summoner.
I do hope you are doing well.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Aw, don't be sour. I told you no lies.
I simply...did not reveal the fullness
of the situation.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Do you have everything you need
now, Eitri? With the soul of this
summoner, will you really be able—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Yes, yes. I ought to be able to create
the weapon capable of destroying
gates: Járngreipr.$k$pI will begin the preparations... Oh, and
I'll be needing that weapon of yours
as well, Summoner.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Be good and hand it over. You have
my endless thanks, of course.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Hurry up. I've received reports that
Nótt, Dagr, and the Askran rabble will
be arriving shortly behind me.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Damn that Nótt... She not only fails
at the simple task I set out for her,
she betrays me as well?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|You did not need to interfere,
you know.$k$pThey would have returned to me
with the summoner and the sword
before long.$k$pThough I suppose it is better to have
the rest of the Askrans out of the
way for now...$k$pBut what are you so afraid
of anyway, Ótr?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|I am not afraid of anything.
Just get started already.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|I would love to, but it seems Prince
Alfonse and the rest have returned
sooner than expected.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! How did they—$k$p$EFace_Anger|Of course... Reginn's compass!
So she's still carrying that after
all this time... Damn!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|It seems you are not immune
to failing simple tasks yourself...
Well, I leave them to you.$k$pBuy me some time to conduct the
proper research on this weapon
and the summoner.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I suppose it's all for the best. I'll take
this opportunity to crush the Askrans
like the insects they are!$k$p$Sbs150|
